name: I'dRatherBeWriting
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to the latest posts from the I'd Rather Be Writing blog from Tom Johnson. Note that I'd Rather Be Writing focuses on *technical writing* (not creative writing). This skill consists of narrations of some of my posts. The content is the same as you can find in podcast feeds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
